title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Transform your event into a dreamy and romantic affair with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner in Terracotta! Made from high quality polyester, this rustic sheer runner is soft to touch, durable, and comfortable. Measuring 35 inches in width and 118 inches in length, it fits most tables effortlessly.

Whether it's a wedding, bridal shower, birthday party, or even a romantic dinner for two, this versatile table runner is perfect for any occasion. Use it as a table runner, chair cover sash, decorative napkin, or even for gift wrapping - the possibilities are endless!

Easy to care for, simply hand wash or machine wash in cold water with mild detergent on a gentle cycle. Avoid ironing and using hot water to maintain the integrity of this beautiful table runner.

Elevate your decor and create an enchanting ambiance with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner. Get yours today and make your event unforgettable! Free to contact us for any questions or concerns.
